content:
### **Updated Process & Adjustments to Knowledge Vault Table**

I fully agree with your **definition of "Required"**, and I will adjust accordingly. **Required** now means:
- **Manually Required** – Fields that **must be entered by a human**.
- **AI-Populated Required** – Fields that must be **automatically populated** if not entered manually.

✅ **PROCESS CONFIRMATION**
Here’s the **7-Step Process** we will follow for each table:
1️⃣ **You provide screenshots of the table.**  
2️⃣ **I generate the "Property Definitions & Requirements"** table with:
   - **Property** (Column Name)  
   - **Type** (Text, Select, Relation, etc.)  
   - **Required?** (Manually Required ✅ / AI-Populated Required 🟦)  
   - **Description** (What it does)  
   - **Comments/Questions** (Considerations, Future Enhancements)  
3️⃣ **We confirm the Property Definitions together.**  
4️⃣ **I generate Sample Data.**  
5️⃣ **You review & approve Sample Data.**  
6️⃣ **Sample Data is loaded into Notion.**  
7️⃣ **The Canvas is updated with the approved Property Definitions & Requirements.**  

---
### **Updated Knowledge Vault - Property Definitions & Requirements**

| **Property**                | **Type**         | **Required?**  | **Description** | **Comments/Questions** |
|-----------------------------|-----------------|---------------|----------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------|
| **Name**                    | Text            | ✅ Yes        | The title of the knowledge entry (Book, Article, Podcast, etc.). | - |
| **Tags**                    | Multi-select    | 🟦 AI-Populated Required | Categorization for filtering and indexing. | Should this be manually overridden if AI makes an incorrect classification? |
| **Media Type**              | Select          | ✅ Yes        | Type of content (Book, Article, Podcast, Video, etc.). | - |
| **Creator**                 | Relation (AI Influencers) | ✅ Yes        | Pulls the name from AI Influencers table. If new, requires manual entry and linking. | How do we handle "Anonymous"? |
| **Full Text/Transcript**     | Text (Long)     | ❌ No        | Full text or transcript (if applicable). | Needed for deep indexing. |
| **Files & Media**           | File Attachment | ❌ No        | Attachments related to this knowledge entry (PDFs, images, etc.). | - |
| **Summary**                 | Text (Short)    | 🟦 AI-Populated Required | A brief summary of the content. | Can AI auto-generate? |
| **Key Takeaways**           | Text (Long)     | 🟦 AI-Populated Required | Actionable insights from the content. | Should this be flagged for manual verification? |
| **Deep Research Available?**| Checkbox        | ❌ No        | Indicates if a full research report exists on this topic. | - |
| **Source Link**             | URL             | ❌ No        | Link to the original source. | - |
| **Influencer/Source**       | Relation (AI Influencers) | ✅ Yes | Connects this entry to an **Influencer or Source** in the AI Influencers table. | - |
| **Personal Knowledge Database (PKD)** | Relation (PKD) | ❌ No | Links this knowledge entry to **PKD insights** if referenced. | - |
| **Notes & Comments**        | Text (Long)     | ❌ No        | Any additional notes or context. | - |
| **Date Added**              | Date            | ✅ Yes        | The date the entry was added. | - |
| **Last Accessed**           | Date            | ❌ No        | The last time this entry was reviewed. | - |
| **Publication Date**        | Date            | ❌ No        | The original publication date of the content. | - |
| **Priority Level**          | Select          | ❌ No        | Urgent, High, Medium, Low. | - |
| **Action Required?**        | Checkbox        | ❌ No        | Flags if follow-up actions are needed. | - |
| **Implementation Status**   | Select          | ❌ No        | Pending, In Progress, Completed. | - |
| **AI Research**             | Relation (AI Research) | ❌ No | Links this entry to AI Research insights. | - |
| **Active?**                 | Checkbox        | ✅ Yes        | Determines if this knowledge entry is actively influencing decisions. | - |

---
### **Next Steps**
1️⃣ **Final Review:** Confirm all properties align with expectations.  
2️⃣ **Approval:** If no changes, I will generate **sample data**.  
3️⃣ **Begin AI Influencers Review** (next table).  

🚀 **Does this look good, or any final tweaks before sample data?**
